00017 typedef void (*sighandler_t)(int);
00018 
00019 static dfsch_parser_ctx_t* volatile running_parser = NULL;
00020 static char* volatile running_prompt = NULL;
00021 #ifdef USE_READLINE
00022 /* this is brain-bamaged and completely unsafe, but in line with readline 
00023  * documentation... go figure :) 
00024  */
00025 static int rl_interrupt_function(int sig){
00026   if (running_parser){
00027     dfsch_parser_reset(running_parser);
00028   }
00029   rl_set_prompt(running_prompt);
00030   rl_replace_line("", 1);
00031   rl_redisplay();
00032 
00033   signal(SIGINT, rl_interrupt_function);
00034 }
00035 
00036 char* dfsch_console_read_line(char* prompt){
00037   char* str;
00038   char* ret;
00039   sighandler_t sh;
00040 
00041   sh = signal(SIGINT, rl_interrupt_function);
00042   str = readline(prompt);
00043   signal(SIGINT, sh);
00044   if (!str){
00045     return NULL;
00046   }
00047   add_history(str);
00048   ret = dfsch_stracpy(str);
00049   free(str);
00050   return ret;
00051 }
00052 #else
00053 char* dfsch_console_read_line(char* prompt){
00054   char* ret;
00055   char* tmp;
00056   size_t allocd;
00057   size_t offset;
00058   size_t i;
00059 
00060   ret = GC_MALLOC(512);
00061   allocd = 512;
00062   offset = 0;
00063 
00064   fputs(prompt, stdout);
00065 
00066   while (1){
00067     if(!fgets(ret + offset, allocd - offset, stdin)){      
00068       return NULL;
00069     }
00070 
00071     offset += strlen(ret + offset);
00072     
00073     if (offset == 0){  /* nothing */
00074         return ret;
00075     }
00076     
00077     if (ret[offset-1] == '\n') {   /* full line */
00078       ret[offset-1] = '\0';
00079       return ret;
00080     }
00081 
00082     allocd += 512;
00083     ret = GC_REALLOC(ret, allocd);
00084   }
00085 }
00086 #endif

00088 #ifdef USE_READLINE
00089 static char * symbol_completion_cb (const char* text, int state){
00090   char *name;
00091   static dfsch_symbol_iter_t* iter;
00092   int len;
00093 
00094 
00095   if (state==0)
00096     iter = NULL;
00097 
00098   len = strlen(text);
00099 
00100   while (name = dfsch_get_next_symbol(&iter)){
00101     if (strncmp (name, text, len) == 0){
00102       return (char*)strdup(name);
00103     }
00104   }
00105   
00106   /* If no names matched, then return NULL. */
00107   return ((char *)NULL);
00108 }
00109 
00110 static char ** symbol_completion (const char* text, int start, int end){
00111   return rl_completion_matches (text, symbol_completion_cb);
00112 }
00113 void dfsch_console_set_object_completion(){
00114   rl_attempted_completion_function = symbol_completion;
00115   rl_basic_word_break_characters = " \t\n\"()";
00116 }
00117 void dfsch_console_set_general_completion(){
00118   rl_attempted_completion_function = NULL;
00119   rl_basic_word_break_characters = " \t\n\"\\'`@$><=;|&{("; 
00120   /* that ugly string comes from readline docs, presumably it is default
00121    * value for this variable and also what bash uses.
00122    */
00123 }
00124 #else
00125 /* Do nothing */
00126 void dfsch_console_set_object_completion(){
00127 }
00128 void dfsch_console_set_general_completion(){
00129 }
00130 #endif

00132 char* dfsch_console_read_line_object(char* prompt){
00133   char* line;
00134   dfsch_console_set_object_completion();
00135   line = dfsch_console_read_line(prompt);
00136   dfsch_console_set_general_completion();
00137   return line;
00138 }
00139 
00140 static int read_callback(dfsch_object_t* obj, dfsch_object_t** res){
00141   *res = obj;
00142   return 0;
00143 }
00144 
00145 static char* get_prompt(dfsch_parser_ctx_t* parser, char* dprompt){
00146   int level = dfsch_parser_get_level(parser);
00147   if (level){
00148     char *prompt;
00149     int fill;
00150     if (strlen(dprompt) < 2){
00151       fill = level*2;
00152     } else {
00153       fill = level*2 + (strlen(dprompt) - 4);
00154       /* minimal fill is 0, minimal level 1, thus 1 * 2 + (2 - 4) = 0 */
00155     }
00156     prompt = GC_MALLOC_ATOMIC(fill+5);
00157     memset(prompt, ' ', fill);
00158     prompt[fill+0] = '.';
00159     prompt[fill+1] = '.';
00160     prompt[fill+2] = '>';
00161     prompt[fill+3] = ' ';
00162     prompt[fill+4] = 0;
00163     return prompt;
00164   }else{
00165     return dprompt;
00166   }
00167 }
00168 
00169 dfsch_object_t* dfsch_console_read_object(char* prompt){
00170   dfsch_parser_ctx_t* parser = dfsch_parser_create();
00171   char* line;
00172   dfsch_object_t* obj;
00173 
00174   dfsch_parser_callback(parser, read_callback, &obj);
00175   running_prompt = prompt;
00176   running_parser = parser;
00177 
00178   while (line = dfsch_console_read_line_object(get_prompt(parser, prompt))){
00179     if (dfsch_parser_feed_line(parser, line)){
00180       running_parser = NULL;
00181       running_prompt = NULL;
00182       return obj;
00183     }
00184   }
00185 
00186   running_parser = NULL;
00187   running_prompt = NULL;
00188   if (dfsch_parser_top_level(parser)){
00189     return dfsch_eof_object();
00190   } else {
00191     dfsch_error("Unexpected end of input", NULL);
00192   }
00193 }
00194 
00195 int dfsch_console_read_objects_parser(char* prompt,
00196                                       dfsch_parser_ctx_t* parser){
00197   int ret;
00198   char* line;
00199 
00200   running_prompt = prompt;
00201   __asm(";;");
00202   running_parser = parser;
00203   DFSCH_UNWIND {
00204     while (line = dfsch_console_read_line_object(get_prompt(parser, prompt))){
00205       DFSCH_WITH_SIMPLE_RESTART(dfsch_make_symbol("abort"), "Return to reader"){
00206         ret = dfsch_parser_feed_line(parser, line);
00207       }DFSCH_END_WITH_SIMPLE_RESTART;
00208       if (ret){
00209         break;
00210       }
00211     }
00212   } DFSCH_PROTECT {
00213     running_parser = NULL;
00214     running_prompt = NULL;
00215   } DFSCH_PROTECT_END;
00216   return ret;
00217 }

00224 int dfsch_console_read_objects(char* prompt,
00225                                dfsch_console_object_cb_t cb,
00226                                void* baton){
00227   dfsch_parser_ctx_t* parser = dfsch_parser_create();
00228   dfsch_parser_set_source(parser, dfsch_make_symbol("*console-io*"));
00229   dfsch_parser_callback(parser, cb, baton);
00230   return dfsch_console_read_objects_parser(prompt, parser);
00231 }

00237 static int repl_callback(dfsch_object_t *obj, void *baton){
00238   dfsch_object_t* ret;
00239   ret = dfsch_eval(obj, baton);
00240   puts(dfsch_object_2_string(ret,100,1));
00241 }
00242 
00243 int dfsch_console_run_repl(char* prompt, 
00244                            dfsch_object_t* env){
00245   return dfsch_console_read_objects(prompt, repl_callback, env);
00246 }
